name: PickupPushPull
author: NotAKidoS
description:
Allows you to push & pull pickups with Mouse, Gamepad, & VR.
Can also optionally rotate props via keybind.

Index users will need to manually bind the missing SteamVR binds.
changelog:
- Fixed issue where saved preferences weren't properly applied on startup.
- Rotation is now only limited while holding a prop that can be rotated, instead of when the rotation bind is held.
